title: Bugs on smite
body: Hi riot I hope you are reading this congrats on the new summoners rift but there's some bugs on smite.When I smite I always have blues lines on my screen then when it's not on cool down the lines are gone it's very annoying if I smite and then I can barley see anything  but lines so plz fix it.

replies.body:
A graphical error. I saw a screenshot of it and thought it was quite funny, excuse me.

Hopefully it gets fixed next patch, though it only seems to be affecting some people.
